thread.section_title: Vaya Adventures Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vaya Adventures | www.vayaadventures.com
thread.title: Diana & Rick G
thread.title_full: Vaya Adventures reviewed by Diana & Rick G

author: Diana & Rick G
title: Diana & Rick G
text:
From start to finish, our experience with Vaya was top notch. Our every expectation was met with stylish hotels in Buenes Aires, Ushaia, and Santiago.
The cruise on the Australis was beautiful, interesting and adventurous, with very comfortable accommodation and food.
Every guide we had went out of their way to make the tours informative, fun and we felt that we'd seen the best of the cities in the short time we had.
Also, the guides were very kind, one woman (sorry, can't remember her name) helped me deal with a dental issue and was very comforting.
Lastly, Evan Smith planned the exact trip we asked for, and was easy to work with and very responsive, as was Jack McCabe.
Thank you Vaya, we already recommended you to anybody who wants to have a similar experience.
